Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-7424 affecting package libxslt for versions less than 1.1.34-10
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-7424 affecting package libxslt for versions less than 1.1.34-10. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libxslt is earlier than 1.1.34-10, affected by CVE-2025-7424
